name: Monster Kingdom
description:
elcome to Monster Kingdom! Explore the wonderful world of creatures, train your monsters, and discover what lies within!

  • Collect and train over 60 different monsters!
  • Experience the immersive single-player storyline!
  • Play online with your friends!
  • Battle to become the #1 trainer!

Brought to you by Zhurosoft, makers of top-10 hit games!
